head.title: Metro Business; Fund for Technology Firms

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New York

hedline.hl1: Metro Business; Fund for Technology Firms

abstract.p: New York City Economic Development Corporation announces plans to reinvest its earnings in venture capital fund that has been used to help technology companies based in city (S)

block.p: The New York City Economic Development Corporation announced plans yesterday to reinvest its earnings in a venture capital fund that has been used to help technology companies based in the city.
With the reinvestment, the fund could grow to $175 million from $76 million, city officials said.
The New York City Economic Development Corporation announced plans yesterday to reinvest its earnings in a venture capital fund that has been used to help technology companies based in the city.
With the reinvestment, the fund could grow to $175 million from $76 million, city officials said.
The fund has invested more than $61 million in 17 New York-based companies, including About.com, 24/ 7 Media and Juno Online Services.
The city's new investment will be about $7.4 million and will be added to $36.6 million also being reinvested by other companies, officials said.
